titles.title: I'm Dead To Sin Through Christ (familiar easy

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}I'm dead to sin Through Christ my Lord For in His death I also died It's written clear In God's own Word And praise His name I'm justified{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}I'm dead to sin Thus I must live To Christ alone Who gave His all And for His love I can't but give My life and gifts Both great and small{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}I'm dead to sin So I must serve My God and King Each day and hour What He commands I must observe And seek to do With heav'nly pow'r{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}I'm dead to sin O blessed thought I now can rest from Care and strife My fight He has Forever fought And now I live His risen life{/lang-eng}
